attributes.action: To minimise the production and sales of counterfeit luxury fashion goods
attributes.additional_details:
The rise of production and sales of couterfeit luxury goods in the fashion has risen by 22% over the last few years, having a significant impact on the industry.

Mock designer handbags are the most sought after item with 31% of sales going towards the knock off arm candy. Whilst sunglasses and watches coming in second with a huge 24% of purchases.

Our aim is too minimise the production and sales of counterfeit luxury fashion goods in order to protect the work of designers and companies within the fashion industry.
